                             Properties properties,
                             SparseData sparseData)
                      throws IOException
        Description copied from class: BaseSparseDataFormatter
        get needed properties out of outdir. convert class names into integers for libsvm. attempt to parse the class name into an integer. if this fails, use an index that we increment. index corresponds to class name's alphabetical order.
